title: Finley Malloc
text:
SCIE(NCE) is a student-led, open-access platform dedicated to bridging the gap between classroom learning and professional scientific discovery. We believe that student research shouldn’t just be an assignment—it should be a contribution to the global scientific dialogue.
Our mission is to provide a rigorous yet accessible space where theoretical depth meets practical application, fostering a community of young researchers who are as comfortable with complex equations as they are with soldering irons.
Editorial Philosophy
Academic Rigor We maintain a standard of excellence in our peer-reviewed articles, ensuring that advanced theoretical shares are both accurate and insightful.
Applied Creativity Science is not a spectator sport. We prioritize projects that demonstrate hands-on engineering, data analysis, and experimental design.
Community Growth By sharing high-quality course notes and academic resources, we aim to lower the barrier to entry for complex STEM subjects within our campus and beyond.
Our Core Pillars
Theoretical Articles | Advanced Insights Deep dives into physics, biology, and chemistry, translating high-level concepts into understandable, rigorous content.
Applied Projects | Engineering & Innovation Showcasing student-built hardware, software solutions, and experimental prototypes that solve real-world problems.
Campus Notes | Knowledge Sharing Peer-curated academic notes designed to help fellow students master the most challenging aspects of the curriculum.
:::
Interested in joining our team or submitting your work? Check our Latest Research for submission guidelines.

title: 基于 ESP32 的校园微型气象站
text: 解决学校气象数据不透明的问题，为户外社团提供参考。

title: 基于 ESP32 的校园微型气象站
text: 解决学校气象数据不透明的问题，为户外社团提供参考。

title: 基于 ESP32 的校园微型气象站
text:
失败分析 (Critical Analysis)
在第一版原型中，我们使用了廉价的 DHT11 传感器，但在高湿度环境下（>80%）数据完全漂移。最终我们更换为 BME280。

title: 基于 ESP32 的校园微型气象站
text:
硬件清单

ESP32-DevKitC
BME280 传感器
太阳能充电板 (5V)

查看源码
